title: ∙ Dr. Leon Eisenberg: Is HIV "an imaginary disease "?
subtitle: The rumors: Dr. Leon Eisenberg, father of ADHD, said just before he died that ADHD' was a major example of a delusional disease.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Dr. Leon Eisenberg, the father of ADHD, said immediately before his death that ADHD was a "key example of a delusional disease. "
